title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
description: What do an art forger, a missing clown and a dead cop have in common? Nothing except for Addison Holmes.Addison is back and better than ever. Err...or at least better than she was. She has the P.I. license to prove it and a stack full of cases to solve. But the biggest mystery is Nick. She knows he's keeping something important from her regarding one of her cases. Either that or he's getting cold feet about marriage.Join Addison and the gang for a real Charlie Foxtrot of an adventure!
author: Liliana Hart
